content:
# It seems that the movement to the iron ore patch was executed, but there is no confirmation of arrival or further actions. 
# I will proceed to harvest iron ore from the patch.

# 11. **Harvest Iron Ore.**
# I will aim to gather a reasonable amount of iron ore, such as 20 units, to start smelting.
harvested_iron_quantity = harvest_resource(nearest_iron_patch, quantity=20)  # Harvest 20 iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting iron ore. 

# 12. **Smelt Iron Ore into Iron Plates.**
# Now that I have iron ore, I will use the Stone Furnace to smelt it into iron plates.
# Assuming it takes 5 iron ore to produce 1 iron plate, I will smelt as much as I can.

iron_ore_quantity = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronOre, 0)

if iron_ore_quantity >= 5:
    plates_to_smelt = iron_ore_quantity // 5  # Calculate how many plates I can smelt.
    for _ in range(plates_to_smelt):
        smelted_plate = smelt_item(Prototype.IronOre, quantity=5)  # Smelting 5 iron ore into 1 iron plate.
    print(f"Smelting complete. Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Show updated inventory after smelting.
else:
    print("Not enough iron ore to smelt into plates.")  # Inform if not enough iron ore was collected.
